com.isep.needsEnergyProject

Class LCADataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.isep.needsEnergyProject.LCADataset

  • public class LCADataset
extends java.lang.Object
    The object representation of a LCA dataset. Allows to make searches for the input and output values of an element in the dataset from its name.
    Author:
    William Aboucaya

        public LCADataset(java.lang.String path)
        Instantiates a new LCADataset for the indicated RDF file. Defines its ontology and stores its Model
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • getInOutValue

        public InOutValue getInOutValue(java.lang.String name)
                         throws java.util.NoSuchElementException
        Searches through the dataset to find the input and output quantities of the requested element.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the element.
        Returns:
        the InOutValue object containing the produced and needed amount of the chosen element.
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if the entry doesn't exist.

        Returns:

        Throws:

      • getAmountUsed

        public double getAmountUsed(java.lang.String nodeId)
        Parameters:
        nodeId - the generated node ID of this specific flow
        Returns:
        the amount related to this flow.

      • isInput

        public boolean isInput(java.lang.String nodeId)
        Parameters:
        nodeId - the generated node ID of this specific flow
        Returns:
        true if the amount described is needed for the production in this flow, false if it is produced.

      • getUnit

        private java.lang.String getUnit(java.lang.String urlIdentifier)
        Parameters:
        urlIdentifier - the fixed identifier of an element.
        Returns:
        the unit in which the amounts are quantified for this element
